channel.title: Need help making a .jar
channel.description: I'm making a .jar of my client, it's a 317. I know the command is "jar cvf "jarnamehere.jar" files to put in jar. Then it makes the jar, but when I run it, it says cannot find main manifest-attribute. and help?

item.title: Need help making a .jar
item.dc:creator: @Bretthearn Bretthearn
item.description:
@Bretthearn wrote:

Alright, I used the jarmaker program, and set the manifest and everything, but when I run it, I get “Invalid or Corrupt File”, any help?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making a .jar
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You need to declare the main-class entry point in the manifest file.

Make a new .txt file, call it manifest.txt and add this to it: Main-Class: Client
Save and exit.

Then execute this code, to create a .jar of your client

jar cfm 317client manifest.txt ./clientdir/*

Allthough it’d be easier if you download a third-party jarmaker with a nice gui and such.
Google for: jarmaker.

Read full topic
